text: Robert Castellanos (born May 11, 1998) is an American professional soccer player, who currently plays as a central defender for Rio Grande Valley FC in the United Soccer League. ==Career== ===Professional=== On February 14, 2017, Castellanos signed with United Soccer League club LA Galaxy II out of the youth academy of Club Atlas of the Liga MX. ===International=== In August 2016, Castellanos was called into a camp by the United States at the U20 level. ==References== ==External links== *Nomads SC bio Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:American soccer players Category:Association football defenders Category:LA Galaxy II players Category:People from Palmdale, California Category:Soccer players from California Category:Sportspeople from Los Angeles County, California Category:United States men's youth international soccer players Category:Rio Grande Valley FC Toros players Category:USL Championship players
title: Robert Castellanos
